component_count.description: The number of components associated with the runtime stack.

created_at.description: The creation time of the runtime stack, in RFC3339 format.

creator.description: The creator name of the runtime stack.

deploy_mode.description: The deploy mode of the runtime stack.

description.description: The description of the runtime stack.

name.description: The name of the runtime stack.

region.description: The region where the runtime stack is located.

spec.description: The configuration of runtime stack, in JSON format.

status.description: The current status of the runtime stack.

type.description: The type of the runtime stack.

updated_at.description: The latest update time of the runtime stack, in RFC3339 format.

version.description: The version of the runtime stack.
